name: nativescript-geocoding
description: Provides access to native geocoding APIs for NativeScript apps (android.location.Geocoder for Android, CLGeocoder for iOS).

scripts.test.android: npm i && npm run tsc && npm run tslint && cd ../demo && tns build android && tns test android --justlaunch
scripts.test.ios: npm i && npm run tsc && npm run tslint && cd ../demo && tns build ios && tns test ios --justlaunch
scripts.plugin.link: npm link && cd ../demo && npm link nativescript-geocoding && cd ../src
scripts.demo.ios: npm i && npm run tsc && cd ../demo-angular && tns run ios
scripts.demo.android: npm i && npm run tsc && cd ../demo-angular && tns run android
